example.eg: Fred walks onward, determined to reach his destination.
example.egtrans: 弗莱德继续向前走，决心定要抵达终点。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 继续向前, 一直往前

example.eg: From the late 1990s onwards, there has been huge growth in the use of home internet.
example.egtrans: 自20世纪90年代之后，家庭网络的使用发生了巨大的增长。

example.eg: Nicole is flying to London then taking the train for her onward journey to Liverpool.
example.egtrans: 妮可乘飞机去伦敦，然后乘火车前往利物浦，继续进行她的旅行。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 继续下去的，继续进行的

example.eg: Not everyone likes the onward rush of technology.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 继续发展的, 继续向前的

dsense.name: onward and upward, onwards and upwards

example.eg: Our marketing campaign is moving onward and upward.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不断改善, 向更好的方向（发展）

dsense.name: onward and upward, onwards and upwards

example.eg: We've done well, but have to keep things going. Onwards and upwards!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 蒸蒸日上, 百尺竿头, 欣欣向荣
